channel.title: Deploy SNAS on Homepage
channel.description: Recent content in Deploy SNAS on Homepage

item.title: Architecture
item.description: You can start using OpenBMP without any BGP feeds of your own. We provide you an application that downloads publicly available bgp data from RouteViews which you can immediately visualize using OpenBMP UI.

item.title: Getting Started
item.description: You can start using OpenBMP without any BGP feeds of your own. We provide you an application that downloads publicly available bgp data from RouteViews which you can immediately visualize using OpenBMP UI.
